main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Saint Mary's, Ohio, on February 21, 1967, involving a hovering object observed by local police.
interesting points: The object was reported to hover at 3,000 feet., The sighting was observed using binoculars., There was only one confirmed witness to the sighting., The report concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation., The sighting involved a significant incident with a train earlier that night, where the train hit an object on the tracks.
witness description: The report came from the St. Mary's Police Department.
